
Houses

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = zips_cut) +
  geom_sf(data = roads_cut, color = "black") +
  geom_sf(data = cut_poly, fill = NA, color = "red", linewidth = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = epa_point, color = "red") +
  geom_sf(data = house_points, color = "brown") +
  theme_minimal() +
  coord_sf(datum = NA)

House Cluster
  
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = zips_cut) +
  geom_sf(data = roads_cut, color = "black") +

  coord_sf(datum = NA)
